name: Garfield Craves Lasagne
description:
A student game made in 2020 by Erik and Phill.

A very short 2D horror game where you go around a house looking for ingredients to cook lasagne for Garfield!  Search objects to look for ingredients but if Garfield shows up remember to click him to make him go away!  This game was originally designed for mobile so the only way to control the character is by using the buttons on the screen.
